flavor_text: - Don't beat them up too badly.
- Don't need to exert yourself here.
- She's either a lunatic, or really good at acting like one.
- Can you guys, uh, put the crossbows down...?
- Fights with poison, though it seems to exacerbate bleed wounds...?

- The Azure Blade of Fate, the captain of The Fatality.
- With his heavy defense, perhaps burn damage may wilt him down faster than normal attacks...?
- A mob boss with an army in his arsenal. Without them, he's nothing.
- Marcy awaits me on the other side.
- The mage of the trio. Get her first.
- The damage dealer of the trio. She'll panic when one of them goes down, and...
- The tank and healer of the trio. ... I will deal with him later.
- I'd love to taste your tea again, but...
